    Methods in game with parameters of type Weapon 
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    boolean Human.attackMissed​(Weapon weapon)
    Humans can fight better than Zombies, so their chances of missing their attacks are lower.
    boolean Zombie.attackMissed​(Weapon weapon)
    If a Zombie bites, their chance of missing that attack is a lot higher than any other attack they use.
    java.lang.String Zombie.bonusEffect​(Weapon weapon, GameMap map)
    If a Zombie bites, they recover 5 HP.
